body_html: Another possibility would be to change the API to return a list/tuple from dp.gather; from there you could just add the results (works for everything) or concatenate them (works for everything except for scalars), but we could push that problem to other apis instead of data parallel ones.
body_text: Another possibility would be to change the API to return a list/tuple from dp.gather; from there you could just add the results (works for everything) or concatenate them (works for everything except for scalars), but we could push that problem to other apis instead of data parallel ones.
body: Another possibility would be to change the API to return a list/tuple from dp.gather; from there you could just add the results (works for everything) or concatenate them (works for everything except for scalars), but we could push that problem to other apis instead of data parallel ones.
